story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0100: Mwahahaha! We’ve been waiting for you.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0200:
I must say, I’m a bit surprised you barged in here
all on your own.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0400:
Are you brave or just reckless? I’ll put that to
the test.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0500: You shall face Giovanni, the greatest Trainer!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0600: Ha! That was a truly intense fight! You have won!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0700:
I have little choice, it seems. I will relinquish Pasio
for now.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0800: But Team Rocket will never fall!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_0900:
Never forget that all Pokémon exist for
Team Rocket!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1000: You’re not fooling anyone. Show’s over.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1200:
You’re Petrel, the Team Rocket executive.
Spill it—where’s Giovanni?
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1400: Wahahaha! I guess my cover is blown!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1500:
My disguise was perfect! You get props for seeing
through it.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1600: But my losing to you won’t change a thing!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_1800:
You can try all you like, but it won’t open unless I
say the password. It only reacts to my voice!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2000:
Shhh, Honchkrow. Don’t say the password this
time, OK?
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2100: If you keep quiet, I’ll give you a shiny toy ring!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2200:
Oh, I forgot—I guess you only liked shiny things
when you were still a Murkrow, huh.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2300:
Look at you now, all big and strong... It’s makin’
me tear up!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2400:
Face it, kid... You’ve hit a dead end. You’re not
going anywhere!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2600:
Oops! Aw, man! I got so excited, I accidentally
shouted out the password!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2700: You really don’t know when to stop talking.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2800:
No turnin’ back now! I’ll stop you before you get
to the boss, no matter what it takes!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_2900:
In the end, you’re still resorting to outnumbering
your opponent? This is why I hate you guys.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3000:
But...if I waste my time on this, Lance and
the others might get to Giovanni first.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3400: How long have you been here?!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3500: Silver! We’re here to help. You can go on ahead!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3600:
My father and I will take care of everyone here!
Let’s help each other out!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3700: I don’t need help from anyone! Stop interfering!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_3800:
You’re the one who’s going to take down
Giovanni, aren’t you? Do you really have the time
to waste here?
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_4300:
Oh, wait. I dropped the Giovanni disguise already,
didn’t I.
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_4400:
Darn. I guess the best I can do is stop the two of
you, then!
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_4500: Heh. You think we’ll just let you do that?
story_teamrocket_02_07000/2401_1201_4600:
Prepare to fall victim to our intricate style and
sinister techniques! Our bond as a family
will prevail!
